posts.post_title: for sale Old Judge Round Album
posts.post_content:
Covers G/VG - internally quite nice. Sorry for the crappy pix....

9250.00 + insured shipping..........
shiny areas like on the faces of a few portraits are just a camera reflection off the ink - they are clean and right in person.

some small spots paper loss ON BACK of a few pages and some toning. It is what it is. A happy new year for all I hope. My TV just went out :-)
friendly,
henry
Is this the same set as A35?

Check out this thread:

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=285910&highlight=rounds[/url]

It's one of my favorite project threads from N54.
and project was nothing short of amazing!
Henry: I'm forever grateful for the A35 Round album you sold to me a couple years back. It is one of my most prized (memorabilia) possessions. ... Wishing you a wonderful 2024!
The Round album is amazing. If i didnt have one already i would grab this one. Beautiful piece of art and excellent value still (as are the other real albums of the early Allen and Ginter sets)
